features: Clear Bright IPS Screen: 3.5-inch display and 640x480 resolution, you can see more details and beautiful scenes in the game.
10000+ Support Classic Games: This R36S game console supports dozens of emulators which covers many types of games, such as adventure, action, racing, etc. And work with 20 emulators.

On The Go Design: Ultra-compact size and old style design, it is very convenient whether you carry it with you during business trips, travel or camping. Recall the dream of the games anytime, anywhere.
Customized Professional System: Exclusive ArkOS Linux system, English default setted and Save & Load features, no more lost datas and start again, providing you excellent gaming experience.
Perfect Gifts for Kids & Nostalgia: This handheld gaming player is a perfect companion to keep your children occupied and improve their hand-eye coordination.
Package List of EWDGOES: 1xR36S 64GB Ver. Transparent Black, 1xUSB-C Charge Cable, 1xScreen Protector by BSTXY, 1xInstruction.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.8 3.8 out of 5 stars 40 ratings 3.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's hard to believe how good the quality of the screen is!
reviews.reviewText: So many generations of Retro gaming made possible by the retro arch emulation engine modified to run on a small handheld that fits in the palm of your hand. This product is a new level of amazing as it combines a beautiful bright screen with dual analogs 4 buttons in the rear and 4 buttons + select start home, and a d-pad that isn't terrible for street fighter type games. The product is preloaded with many older games which all run rather perfectly except for maybe Dreamcast games.Couple of things to note. First unit I received ran beautifully but the R1 button was stuck and had to be depressed over and over to get it unstuck. Eventually I sent for a return and replace and it took almost 3 weeks to get a replacement, but the replacement is perfect and doesn't have this issue. Another note, sometimes games will not load and crash to the selection screen over and over and can only be resolved by hitting the small button on the right side of the handheld. It appears some games load something into the RAM that prevents other games from loading properly. So don't panic if a game doesn't load after playing a few games. The sound is extremely loud which can be adjust with the vol + and - buttons on the right side of the device.Overall I'm in love with this handheld and plan to purchase the other ones offered by this brand/seller. I highly recommend this handheld for retro, nostalgia, and attention to details. Due be careful with the buttons as they may not last a long time without care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far, seems promising
reviews.reviewText: I obviously haven't tried and testing all 15k games currently installed on the unit, but just picking some at random, they played with only relatively minor issues. I expected audio to be a big issue, and I suspect some of these titled will suffer some pretty rough sound glitches, but I haven't run into yet, so that's promising!Like others have noted, the screen is awesome. Did not expect it to be so bright and crisp!The biggest immediate issue I had was realizing that the controls on the unit won't match the control schemes of most games, so there will always be some trial and error to figure out the controls, but that is just the nature of it, and absolutely not a dig at the handheld itself.I do wish there was a better way to navigate the games. Having to scroll through hundreds or thousands of games is a bit much at times. A search function would certainly be appreciated. But that is just searching for things to complain about.Whether it is worth the price is debatable. I am a pretty casual gamer that grew up on a lot of these titles and just don't have any old consoles around that still work. For someone who was a die-hard fan of these games, it might be worth the price, but then again, they probably have the consoles and titles and won't be needing an emulator. haha.So far, I am pretty happy and I look forward to checking out some of these old games I haven't touched in over two decades!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Probably one the best handhelds
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace my gba flash cart, it can actually run ps1 games well but theres a small learning curve on reinstalling ArkOs that took me a couple hours after looking it up, installing new games is very simple

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Out of the 15k games only a handful work and most are duplicates. The system offer a customer list so I combed through the 15k worth of duplicates building a list of game I wanted to play. Finished the list, system crashed and list was gone on reset. WASTE OF MONEY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not bad. Few games don't work, how do I know it's charging?
reviews.reviewText: So it's not bad, Nintendo 64 games, Dreamcast games, hell any true 3d game is laggy, very laggy. Some DS games that require touch won't let you go past a certain part. And I have no clue if it's ever charging. After rebooting from being stuck on Pokémon Diamond I'm now greeted with a glitch voltage screen that shuts it off after a few seconds claiming a voltage issue. Please help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Console is as good as it says. Display is bright and very good guality. Love the machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This handheld isn't only nostalgic but has all the capabilities to be such a great device. Unfortunately after having this device for about a week. Im running into issues left and right. Games not working and now the buttons are not working correctly. I thought it was just one game but it's multiple games in which the bottons act up.I would really appreciate someone reaching out. I don't want to give up on this product.
Se puede jugan hasta PS! sin ningun problema, PSP ya flaquea pero se pueden jugar algunos titulos. Excelente regalo para personas que crecieron en los arcade
